metadata.title: Shabbir Usmani re-designated as coordinator to PM on Kashmir Affairs, GB

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 14 (APP):Shabbir Ahmed Usmani has been re-designated as the Coordinator to the Prime Minister on Kashmir Affairs, Gilgit-Baltistan (GB), and States and Frontier Regions (SAFRON) Division. According to a notification issued by the Cabinet Secretariat on Friday, Prime Minister has approved the re-designation of Shabbir Ahmed Usmani to the said position.
